description.message: Chrome extension for vk.com that hides unwanted posts. You can define types of posts that will be hided.

options_description.message: The application cleans vkontakte news from reposts of the groups.
options_description.description: Description of app on options page

options_repostFromGroups.message: Hide repost of the groups and the public pages?

options_withLinks.message: Hide posts with links?Black list of links

options_class.message: Show the title of the hidden post?
